title: Milly-Molly-Mandy Again
description: 1965. Reprinted. 96 pages. Illustrated dust jacket over orange & yellow illustrated cloth. Pen inscription to front free endpaper. Visible crayon to front endpapers and title page. Pages are mildly tanned throughout. Text is clear. Binding remains firm. Boards have mild shelf wear with light rubbing and corner bumping. Some light marking and sunning. Unclipped jacket. Panels have light edge wear with tears and creasing. Visible tanning all over.
author: Joyce Lankester Brisley
